channel.title: What's Going On AI
channel.description: Your daily dose of AI research, news, tools, and insights. Stay updated with the latest in artificial intelligence.

item.title: AI Decoded: Understanding Transformers
item.description: A deep dive into the Transformer architecture that powers modern AI systems like GPT, Claude, and Gemini.

item.title: AI Decoded: Diffusion Models Explained
item.description: Learn how diffusion models power image generation tools like Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, and Midjourney.

item.title: Trending: Agentic Crafting with ROLL and ROCK
item.description: Exploring the Let It Flow paper on building AI agents with the Agentic Learning Ecosystem.

item.title: Trending: Anthropic's Model Context Protocol
item.description: Understanding Anthropic's approach to giving AI models skills and tool-use capabilities.

item.title: Trending: Context Graphs for LLMs
item.description: How graph-based context management improves LLM reasoning and memory.

item.title: AI Decoded: Embeddings Deep Dive
item.description: Understanding vector embeddings - the foundation of modern AI search and retrieval systems.

item.title: AI Decoded: RLHF Explained
item.description: Reinforcement Learning from Human Feedback - how AI models learn to be helpful, harmless, and honest.
